item.description:
Look for our ads in the Hartford Courant starting on 12-27-2007. We have other invited groups, so get your ticket online to reserve your spot in the FREE Speed Dating ($40 Value). We have invited other groups to this event and we expect over 100 local singles!

PLEASE RSVP ON THE CENTRAL CT SINGLES MEETUP PAGE click here

We have space available for New Years Eve Speed Dating, so put Speed Dating in your RSVP to reserve your spot.

RSVP on http://singles.meetup...

Party with Central CT Singles and Meet Your Perfect Match on New Years Eve 2007!

End 2007 and begin 2008 with 100+ Local Singles and have a great time with us at the Central CT Singles Ultimate New Years Eve Bash with FREE Speed Dating At Ultimate Billiards in Berlin, CT (on the Berlin Turnpike next to Newington)

Drink Specials and Prizes All Night

We will have FREE Pool Lessons and prizes all night long!

FREE Speed Dating ($40 value) -so buy your tickets now!

Ages: 30 to 60

Dress is Casual

FREE Air Hockey
FREE Ping Pong
FREE Darts
FREE Card Games
FREE Basketball Shot Clock Arcade
FREE Movies on the BIG Screen
FREE Parking
FREE Munchies and Snacks
FREE Speed Dating included

Drink Specials:
$2 Bud, Bud Light, Miller Light, Coors Light 16 ounce drafts
$4 Imported 16 ounce draft including Guinness and Sam Adams
$3 Wine all varieties
$4 Champagne Coolers

Tickets $50 in advance or at the Event

Buy your tickets now, and sign up for FREE Speed Dating - or just party with us on New Year's Eve 2007!

We have made many connections at our events because we take the time to make sure you meet as many local singles as possible!

RSVP on http://singles.meetup...

For more info, call Central CT Singles at (860) 236-3343
or visit http://www.CentralCTS...

See you at the party!

Jason
Central CT Singles
Meet Local Singles At Fun Events!
www.CentralCTSingles.com
(860) 236-3343

Check Out our upcoming events on www.CentralCTSingles.com

Membership is FREE, so join today!

UPCOMING EVENTS:

Sat January 12 Central CT Singles Neon Bowling Party -Stay Tuned For Details

Sat January 19 Ultimate Pool Party at Ultimate Billiards -Stay Tuned For Details

Sat. January 26 Central CT Singles Dining Party -Stay Tuned For Details

Sat. February 2 Central CT Singles Theatre Night -Stay Tuned For Details

Sign up for our FREE email newsletters and get the latest info about our upcoming events.
Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com or email events@CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the black "CTNites.com VIP Entertaiment Clubber" T-shirts.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Meet Your Perfect Match at Central CT Singles Ultimate New Years Eve Bash
